attributes.action: Bring back the Hangman, and the Dragonard as well
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the numbers of people being murdered the Death Penalty must be reintroduced. One MP that I discussed this item with said" what if we hangan inocent person" My rejoinder was "how many of the poor buggers being murdered have been Guilty".The Dragonard should be reintroduced, then anyone caught using Drugs, other than Medicaly prescribed, should be Birched.Within 5 years of the reintroduction of these measures there would be spaces in the Prisons, and many Blair type Legal Pleaders would be out of work.Therefore this will not happen in my lifetime.The present incumbents of 10 Downing Street will see to it.being dropped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
